alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 09 at 2:33PM EST until December 11 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor to moderate flooding around high tide early Monday morning. Flooding less than one foot deep, but perhaps 1 to 2 feet deep at some locations on the upper end of Narragansett Bay, including Providence. * WHERE...In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence, Eastern Kent, Bristol, Washington and Newport Counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Narragansett Bay at Fox Point MLLW Categories - Minor 7.0 ft, Moderate 9.0 ft, Major 10.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/05 PM 4.0/ 4.5 -0.8/-0.2 0.6/ 1.1 1 None 10/06 AM 4.7/ 5.2 0.0/ 0.5 0.2/ 0.8 1 None 10/06 PM 4.5/ 5.0 -0.2/ 0.2 0.9/ 1.4 1 None 11/07 AM 6.8/ 7.3 2.1/ 2.6 2.2/ 2.7 2 Minor 11/07 PM 3.1/ 3.6 -1.7/-1.2 -0.8/-0.2 1-2 None 12/07 AM 4.0/ 4.5 -0.8/-0.2 -1.0/-0.5 1 None Narragansett Bay at Conimicut Point MLLW Categories - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington
